file.name: bkg.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.3 info: version: 0.5.0 title: 'DCSA OpenAPI specification for Booking' description: | API specification issued by DCSA.org. For explanation to specific values or objects please refer to the Information Model v3.0 It is possible to use this API as a standalone API. In order to do so it is necessary to use the poll-endPoint - /v1/events in order to poll event information. It is recomended to implement the DCSA Documentation Event Hub in order to use the push model. Here events are pushed as they occur. license: name: Apache 2.0 url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html contact: name: Digital Container Shipping Association (DCSA) url: https://dcsa.org email: info@dcsa.org tags: - name: Booking Request - name: Booking Confirmation - name: Events paths: /v1/booking-request-summaries: get: tags: - Booking Request summary: Get booking requests description: | Retrieves the booking request 'metadata'.' parameters: - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.1.1#/components/parameters/carrierBookingReference' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/parameters/limit' - Booking Request summary: Put booking requests parameters: - $ref: '#/components/parameters/carrierBookingReferencePathParam' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/parameters/Api-Version-Major' description: | Updates the booking request with the carrierBookingReference in the path. requestBody: description: Parameters used to update the booking request required: true content: application/json: schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DOCUMENTATION_DOMAIN/1.1.0#/components/schemas/bookingRequest' responses: '202': description: Booking request accepted headers: API-Version: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/headers/API-Version' content: application/json: schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DOCUMENTATION_DOMAIN/1.1.0#/components/schemas/bookingRequest' default: description: Unexpected error headers: API-Version: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/headers/API-Version' content: application/json: schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/ERROR_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/schemas/error' /v1/booking-confirmation-summaries: get: tags: - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/parameters/Api-Version-Major' responses: '201': description: The Booking Confirmation headers: API-Version: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/headers/API-Version' content: application/json: schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DOCUMENTATION_DOMAIN/1.1.0#/components/schemas/bookingConfirmation' default: description: Unexpected error headers: API-Version: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/headers/API-Version' content: application/json: schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/ERROR_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/schemas/error' /v1/events/: get: tags: - Events summary: Get Shipment events description: | Retrieves Shipment events. The default sort order is by eventCreatedDateTime in descending order (DESC) parameters: # Chunk with Shipment related event parameters - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.1.1#/components/parameters/shipmentEventTypeCode' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.1.1#/components/parameters/carrierBookingReference' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.1.1#/components/parameters/transportDocumentReference' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.1.1#/components/parameters/transportDocumentTypeCode' # Chunk with base event parameters - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/parameters/eventCreatedDateTime' # Chunk with Global related event parameters - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/parameters/limit' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/parameters/cursor' - $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/parameters/Api-Version-Major' responses: '200': description: Request successful headers: API-Version: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/headers/API-Version' Current-Page: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/headers/Current-Page' Next-Page: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/headers/Next-Page' Prev-Page: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/headers/Prev-Page' Last-Page: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/headers/Last-Page' First-Page: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/headers/First-Page' content: application/json: schema: type: array items: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/EVENT_DOMAIN/1.1.1#/components/schemas/shipmentEvent' default: description: Unexpected error headers: API-Version: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/headers/API-Version' content: application/json: schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/ERROR_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/schemas/error' components: parameters: ############# # Path params ############# carrierBookingReferencePathParam: in: path name: carrierBookingReference schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.0#/components/schemas/carrierBookingReference' required: true ############## # Query params ############## documentStatus: in: query name: documentStatus description: | Filter by the status of the document in the process. Possible values are: - RECE (Received) - DRFT (Drafted) - PENA (Pending Approval) - PENU (Pending Update) - REJE (Rejected) - APPR (Approved) - ISSU (Issued) - SURR (Surrendered) - SUBM (Submitted) - VOID (Void) schema: $ref: 'https://api.swaggerhub.com/domains/dcsaorg/DCSA_DOMAIN/1.0.2#/components/schemas/documentStatus' documentSignature: in: query name: documentSignature description: The signature of the Transport Document to approve schema: type: string required: true
